1121342770441019393.text: What does “banking’s uber moment” mean? People who have money that they are not using will drop it round at your house? You can use other peoples bank accounts while they’re not using them? Someone with a bank account will bank for you if you don’t have one?

1121466356065501184.text:
Press releases that are meaningless in measuring business success:
Partnerships
POCs
Patents
Go-lives
Number of downloads

Press releases that are interesting:
Profit reports
Number of active customers
Sales/mergers

Even these last ones don’t indicate sustainable success.

1121152276436066305.text: Glass artist Satoshi Tomizu sculpts small glass spheres that appear to contain entire solar systems and galaxies. Planets made of opals, flecks of real gold, and trails of colored glass seem to spin and loop like twists in the Milky Way http://ow.ly/FuZV30owOoH pic.twitter.com/gVCdSIpzA6
